title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Goal-Based Online Education for Strengthening Fundamental Emergency Medicine Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Improvement in applying initial assessment protocols for 20 common symptom groups in emergency room settings (90% accuracy).
Acquisition of step-by-step performance capability in the ABCDE approach during severe trauma patient management (completed within 10 minutes).
Error-free performance of dosage calculations and administration procedures for 15 emergency medications (verified via math-based calculations).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
